title: How come my iPhone doesn’t chime anymore when I ring for it from my Apple Watch? - Quora
tags: Find My iPhone & Find My Mac

response.answer_text: Do you mean when you press the phone buzz icon in control centre on your watch? If that’s what you mean, and your phone is no longer chiming, I’d probably re-pair them. If you disconnect them in the Watch app it will create a backup and you can restore all your data. But it should fix the connection issue.
Hello, When your Apple Watch is connected to your iPhone, most notifications are received on the watch in leu of the phone. Good luck.
